title: Get the details of an Asset Group

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: query_entity
parameters.description: The entity that you want to query. Enum values: ASSET , MEMBER .

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to filter by. If the query_entity is ASSET , you can either use fuzzy search by specifying asset_name related keywords or use exact search by specifying asset_id to filter the results. If the query_entity is MEMBER , you can either use fuzzy search by specifying user_name related keywords or use exact search by specifying user_email to filter the results.
